statements: SELECT * FROM SportsTeam WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam WHERE team_sport = 'Football';
SELECT team_name, city FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_sport FROM SportsTeam WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT MAX(team_id) FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT MIN(team_id) FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT AVG(team_id) FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT DISTINCT team_sport FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM SportsTeam WHERE team_sport = 'Soccer';
SELECT team_name FROM SportsTeam WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_sport FROM SportsTeam WHERE team_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam WHERE team_name LIKE '%Team%';
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam ORDER BY team_sport ASC;
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam WHERE city IN ('Chicago', 'Boston');
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam WHERE team_id = 5 OR team_id = 10;
SELECT SUM(team_id) FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam WHERE team_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT team_name, sport_type FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM Player p JOIN SportsTeam t ON p.team_id = t.team_id GROUP BY p.team_id;
SELECT player_name FROM Player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM SportsTeam t LEFT JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id GROUP BY t.team_id;
SELECT * FROM Player WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT t.team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id GROUP BY t.team_id HAVING total_players > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT sport_type FROM SportsTeam;
SELECT p.player_name, t.team_name FROM Player p LEFT JOIN SportsTeam t ON p.team_id = t.team_id;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id WHERE player_id < 10;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, MAX(player_id) AS max_player_id FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, sport_type, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id GROUP BY t.team_id, t.sport_type;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id WHERE sport_type = 'Football';
SELECT team_name, player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id GROUP BY t.team_id HAVING total_players > 2;
SELECT t.team_name, p.player_name FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id WHERE t.sport_type = 'Basketball';
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, AVG(player_id) AS avg_player_id FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, sport_type, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM SportsTeam t JOIN Player p ON t.team_id = p.team_id WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY t.team_id, t.sport_type;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name FROM players;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE match_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id;
SELECT teams.team_name, matches.match_date FROM teams JOIN matches ON teams.team_id = matches.team1_id;
SELECT teams.team_name AS team1_name, matches.match_date, matches.winner_id FROM teams JOIN matches ON teams.team_id = matches.team1_id;
SELECT players.player_name, matches.match_date FROM players JOIN matches ON players.team_id = matches.team1_id;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT p.player_name, m.match_date FROM players p JOIN matches m ON p.team_id = m.team1_id;
SELECT t1.team_name AS team1_name, t2.team_name AS team2_name FROM matches m JOIN teams t1 ON m.team1_id = t1.team_id JOIN teams t2 ON m.team2_id = t2.team_id;

SELECT t1.team_name AS team1_name, t2.team_name AS team2_name, t3.team_name AS winner_name FROM matches m JOIN teams t1 ON m.team1_id = t1.team_id JOIN teams t2 ON m.team2_id = t2.team_id JOIN teams t3 ON m.winner_id = t3.team_id;
SELECT t.team_name AS team_name, COUNT(p.player_id) AS player_count FROM teams t LEFT JOIN players p ON t.team_id = p.team_id GROUP BY t.team_name;
SELECT team_name, AVG(player_id) AS avg_players FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS unique_players FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, MAX(player_id) AS max_player_id FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, MIN(player_id) AS min_player_id FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, SUM(player_id) AS total_player_id FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, CASE WHEN COUNT(player_id) > 5 THEN 'Many Players' ELSE 'Few Players' END AS player_count_status FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, match_date, CASE WHEN match_date <= '2022-02-28' THEN 'Past Match' ELSE 'Upcoming Match' END AS match_status FROM teams JOIN matches ON teams.team_id = matches.team1_id;
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, sport FROM teams;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE sport = 'Football';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teams;
SELECT MAX(team_id) FROM teams;
SELECT MIN(team_id) FROM teams;
SELECT AVG(team_id) FROM teams;
SELECT SUM(team_id) FROM teams;
SELECT DISTINCT sport FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) FROM teams GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, sport, COUNT(*) FROM teams GROUP BY team_name, sport;
SELECT team_name, sport FROM teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, sport FROM teams ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM teams LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM teams OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE team_name IN ('Team A', 'Team B', 'Team C');
SELECT * FROM team
SELECT team_name, sport FROM team
SELECT * FROM player
SELECT player_name, age FROM player
SELECT * FROM match
SELECT match_date, team1_id, team2_id FROM match
SELECT * FROM stadium
SELECT stadium_name, city FROM stadium
SELECT * FROM tournament
SELECT tournament_name, sport FROM tournament
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM team INNER JOIN player ON team.team_id = player.team_id
SELECT team_name, match_date FROM team INNER JOIN match ON team.team_id = match.team1_id
SELECT team1_id, team2_id, stadium_name FROM match INNER JOIN stadium ON match.team1_id = stadium.stadium_id
SELECT tournament_name, city FROM tournament LEFT JOIN stadium ON tournament.sport = stadium.city
SELECT DISTINCT sport FROM team
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player
SELECT AVG(age) FROM player
SELECT MAX(age) FROM player
SELECT MIN(age) FROM player
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM match
